# Discovery Questions

1) How often do your vector indexes change?
2) Do you need browser/edge search without a DB?
3) What is your largest pack size and target latency?
4) Do you already host data on S3/Cloudflare/CDN?
5) Whatâ€™s your update/rollback strategy today?
6) Who owns embedding generation and versioning?
7) What compliance or audit requirements exist for model/data snapshots?
8) How do you validate search quality today?
9) Are you willing to trade freshness for portability?
10) Where do failures hurt most: build, serve, or client?
